title: Border, late 16th–early 17th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: grid of laid cords with needle lace (reticella style)
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Border of square compartments filled with stylized floral and foliated forms in an alternating pattern. Connected by brides and interspersed by portes.

tombstone.epitaph:

late 16th–early 17th century. Medium: linen
